评论详情: Haven’t washed or worn yet but wow what a surprise to find this heavy weighted, soft, well constructed hoodie! Absolutely works for everybody: adults, teens, etc. Buying in every color!
This sweatshirt fits so great!!! The material is a good quality.
Hoodie is very warm. Green color looks great. Oversized but not sloppy.

评论概述: Heavy hoodie that is super comfy to wear
评论详情: Who doesn't like a large oversized and comfortable hoodie to lay around in. I got this hoodie hoping that it will do just that I it didn't disappoint. It is quite a heavyweight hoodie as it is plenty thick when compared to other hoodies that I own which are thinner in material. The hoodie itself is nice and soft and a pleasure to be in. The elastic cuffs on the sleeve and the bottom are nice and secure so it keeps wind from blowing in while the hood is robust with a double layer (the inner portion of the hood is the same as the outer layer in effect making it twice as thick as the rest of the hoodie and should do well in keeping the head warm. I personally like the worn in look and feel really comfortable in this hoodie.

I recently got the Men's Oversized Hoodie Pullover for my son, and I couldn't be happier with my choice! This hoodie is incredibly stylish and has quickly become one of his favorite pieces. The trendy design is perfect for today's fashion, and it fits him just right.  What really stands out to me is the unique material. It has an antique yet modern vibe that makes it both elegant and eye-catching. The combination of comfort and style is hard to find, but this hoodie nails it!
Stylish and fits as expected.

This is a well-made garment that looks good. The vintage finish makes it feel authentic, bringing back some 90s nostalgia. My daughter immediately claimed it. She loved that they included elastic at the waist, giving her a better fit. Her only other feedback is that it's hot. We live in a swamp, so yeah, heavy-weight hoodies are going to be hot.  Buy this only if you want cool-looking, high-quality, and comfortable at a reasonable price.

The men’s oversized hoodie is truly a standout piece that deserves a five-star review. The fabric is thick and plush, providing an incredible amount of warmth and coziness that's perfect for lounging around or layering up on chilly days. It’s clear that high-quality materials were used, as the hoodie feels substantial and durable while maintaining a soft, inviting texture.  In addition to its impressive fabric, the hoodie’s design is both stylish and versatile. The oversized fit is on-trend and offers a relaxed, comfortable silhouette that pairs effortlessly with casual wear. The color options are sleek and modern, making it easy to coordinate with any outfit. Overall, this hoodie combines functionality with fashion seamlessly, delivering both comfort and a cool, laid-back look. It’s become a go-to staple in my wardrobe, and I highly recommend it for anyone seeking a blend of style and coziness.

When I first saw this package I thought it was the thickest vacuum sealed chunk of beef jerky my eyes gazed upon!  Even the package itself had that texture.  As I allowed some air back into the sealed vessel my stomach became rather bummed out to miss a one inch jerky feast the size of a large laptop.  My hands though, they found the apparel to be quite comforting.Ah yes, the hoodie!  Wow, It was much thicker than I expected!  Perfect for the cool days nearing as I reside in the far north.  I pulled it over my head and the size I requested was a perfect fit.  This fits snug and it is so warm!  The color is alright at not a pure black...as it has been washed some.  Fine by me as I look like a nice fat brown bear with a clean coat on display.  Best yet is that no mosquitoes can get their plasma fix through this thing!  Awww, poor things.Seems to be quality material as it is holding up just fine.
Thick hoodie

Nice hoodie and heavier than some of the standard name brand hoodies I own. I wear between large and xl depending on brand. Based on some of the reviews I decided to order a large. I have to say though it doesn’t seem very oversized. Because I got the large, I’ll have to be careful drying it so it doesn’t shrink. As for fit, it fits good on me. I’m 5’7 and the sleeve length is perfect. I think the sleeves could be a little short on tall people. It is comfy though and like I said has some heft to it in my opinion. I also like the vintage look. I almost took off a star because I think it’s a bit pricey, but then I guess that’s subjective so I didn’t. Overall I’m very happy with this hoodie and will get a lot of use out of it this fall sitting around a campfire.

评论概述: Very HEAVY WEIGHT HOODIE... will be perfect when it gets cold out!
评论详情: This is a super heavy weight hoodie that feels comfortable and warm. Quality stitching and perfect pre-washed feel & look. This will be great to wear once it cools off this winter.

This is a thick/heavy hoodie that is quality made. The cuffs and elastic band is tight and snug around the wrist and waist.  It's heavy, so it will keep you warm, so warm I would recommend wearing on a much colder day...  Overall, I fully recommend this item, I ensure you, you will not be disappointed!

I received this sweatshirt, so I could write an honest review for Amazon customers.  This Vintage streetwear sweatshirt keeps me warm, looks cool, and hides how fat I am. It’s made from super soft acid washed cotton, with a fleece lined interior. It couldn’t be more comfortable, adding a certain panache to whatever you wear it with.  I call it my adventure sweatshirt. Whenever I wear it, people think I’m a lot hipper and more interesting than I probably really am. BONUS! For me, it makes meeting new people a lot easier. I know I’m looking good, so my confidence level goes up, as well.  I’m not saying that will be the same for you but give it a try. If it doesn’t work, try mouthwash.

It took me a bit to try this on since it's been very hot and humid in recent weeks, so I picked a time when the A/C was blasting full-on. Fall will be here before you know it and I can see this hoodie being heavy in my rotation.
Really great quality. It is so soft and comfortable to wear and looks just like the picture
This isnt a typical thin walmart hoodie, it has some weight to it. I also really like the vintage/washed finish on it, sizing was pretty accurate as well, on par with other XLs
My daughter loves this hoodie so much! The material is so soft and smooth to the touch. She doesn't want to take it off. It fits nicely and now she wants more.

This is a very good quality heavy hoodie. Came shrink-wrapped like a brick and had a strong chemical smell. Threw it in the washer, medium tumble... came out nice, soft, smelling wonderful.  I would recommend this hoodie.

Mens pullover hoodie. very soft and comfortable to wear. well made. sizing is accurate as well as the description. good quality material for the cost. fits as expected. this will be great for the cooler months. the color is vintage washed green. well-made as well.

评论概述: Reminds me of a well used hoodie that's old
评论详情: It's definitely heavy duty. It reminds me of a well used hoodie in the looks but not in function.  I washed it and hang dry as not to shrink. It does feel as though it might be a bit small its size even before washing.  Overall, solid.

The Men's Hoodies Oversized Hoodie Pullover is both stylish and comfortable, making it a fantastic addition to any wardrobe. Here are some key points:  Stylish Design: The vintage washed look and oversized fit give this hoodie a trendy, streetwear vibe that stands out. Comfortable Fit: Made from heavyweight cotton, this hoodie provides warmth and coziness, perfect for chilly days or casual wear. Versatile Wear: Ideal for couples and suitable for a variety of occasions, from lounging at home to going out with friends. Durable Quality: The high-quality material and construction ensure that this hoodie will last through many wears and washes. In conclusion, the Men's Hoodies Oversized Hoodie Pullover is a must-have for anyone looking for a blend of style and comfort. Its fashionable design, comfortable fit, and durable quality make it a great choice for everyday wear. Highly recommended!
Needs to run through fluff cycle in dryer. Comes in a vacuum packed bag. Heavy, thick, luscious fabric, GREAT style, slightly distressed vintage look. Beautiful stitching.
This is a super comfy hoodie with a nice vintage color treatment. The inside is very soft and the fit is true to size.

I am in love with this hoodie. The fabric is very soft and it’s quite heavy. It will be so nice to wear when it’s chilly out. The washed effect is cool and it is made very well. The sleeves are a nice length, they could be a little longer IMO, but I have really long arms. It fit as expected and the cuffs are tight. No tie for the hood and I love that.

This good quality, heavy hoodie is a nice addition to your fall, light-winter wardrobe. Basic design, well-made, does the job. As they say in the product description, this is oversized. Be aware that a small (which I ordered) is actually closer to a regular large.
Die Farbe ( bestellt rosa) entspricht nicht dem gelieferten Produkt( Lachsfarbe)  Die Kommunikation und Rückerstattung durch den Verkäufer sehr kompliziert.  Amazon hat das aber sehr gut gelöst!
